question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
Can the damage from Zer0 be prevented?
answer: The Runner can prevent the damage from Zer0, but they will not gain 1 or draw 2 cards as the cost will not have fully been paid. If the Runner prevents the damage from Zer0, can they attempt to use the ability again?
